creator: dan.hagedorn@pnl.gov
text:
Both the binary and source gzipped tar files have directory checksum errors when
unzipped and untarred on a Solaris 2.8 OS.

This problem is not apparent when unzipped and untarred under IRIX 6.5.12.

Thanks!

Checkout
http://jakarta.apache.org/builds/jakarta-ant/release/v1.3/bin/README

You will see the note that you need to use GNU tar. The version of tar on 
Solaris cannot untar these files.

Thanks
creator: conor@apache.org
